mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.area AS "area", a.address AS "address", a.office_id as "officeId", a.office_name as "officeName", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.phone AS "phone", a.employees AS "employees", a.aunts AS "aunts", a.service_point AS "servicePoint", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u6.name AS "user.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_station( id, name, type, area, address, user_id, phone, employees, aunts, service_point, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{area}, #{address}, #{user.id}, #{phone}, #{employees}, #{aunts}, #{servicePoint}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE service_station SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, user_id = #{user.id}, phone = #{phone}, employees = #{employees}, aunts = #{aunts}, service_point = #{servicePoint}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
